scripts.check: npm run typecheck && npm run lint && npm run build
scripts.verify: npm run typecheck && npm run build
scripts.ship: npm run check && (echo ''; echo '--- Git status ---'; git status; echo ''; echo '--- Diff stat ---'; git diff --stat; git diff --cached --stat; echo ''; echo '--- Next: commit & push ---'; echo '  git add -A'; echo '  git commit -m "<message>"'; echo '  git push origin main')
